burgers.name: Bite of Bacon Bliss
burgers.description: Savor the flavor of a juicy flame-grilled patty topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, vine-ripened tomatoes, and a dollop of creamy mayo on a toasted sesame seed bun.

burgers.name: Egg-cellent Delight
burgers.description: Indulge in a perfectly seasoned beef patty, grilled to perfection, crowned with a fried egg, crispy bacon, melted American cheese, fresh arugula, and a tangy mustard sauce on a soft brioche bun.

burgers.name: Delightful Whoppuh
burgers.description: Enjoy our signature smoky-flavored beef patty, layered with smoky BBQ sauce, crunchy pickles, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, melted cheddar, and a zesty mayo on a warm, toasted bun.

burgers.name: Double Delight Western
burgers.description: A double stack of succulent grilled patties, topped with crispy onion rings, melted cheddar cheese, hickory-smoked bacon, tangy BBQ sauce, and fresh lettuce on a toasted sesame seed bun.

burgers.name: Steakhouse Sensation
burgers.description: Dive into a thick, juicy steakhouse patty, topped with caramelized onions, saut√©ed mushrooms, melted Swiss cheese, fresh lettuce, and a creamy horseradish sauce on a toasted artisan bun.

burgers.name: Bite King
burgers.description: Relish the royal taste of a king-sized grilled beef patty, topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar, fresh lettuce, tomato slices, crunchy pickles, and a smoky BBQ sauce on a sesame seed bun.

burgers.name: BBQ Bliss
burgers.description: Experience the bliss of a tender grilled patty, smothered in rich BBQ sauce, topped with crispy onion straws, melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomatoes on a soft brioche bun.

burgers.name: Bacon Duo Delight
burgers.description: Enjoy a savory grilled chicken patty, paired with crispy bacon strips, melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, and a zesty ranch sauce, all nestled in a toasted sesame seed bun.

burgers.name: Ultimate Crisp Chicken
burgers.description: Bite into the crispiest chicken patty, topped with fresh lettuce, juicy tomato slices, melted pepper jack cheese, and a tangy honey mustard sauce, all served on a toasted brioche bun.

burgers.name: Double Crisp Royale
burgers.description: Twice the chicken, twice the crispiness, with two golden-fried chicken patties, topped with creamy coleslaw, fresh pickles, melted Swiss cheese, and a spicy mayo sauce on a toasted sesame seed bun.

burgers.name: Chicken Delight
burgers.description: A towering delight of a tender chicken patty, topped with fresh lettuce, sliced tomatoes, melted provolone cheese, crispy bacon, and a creamy garlic aioli on a toasted ciabatta bun.

burgers.name: Longbird
burgers.description: Savor the taste of a long, savory chicken patty, topped with fresh lettuce, tomato slices, melted mozzarella, crispy bacon, and a tangy ranch dressing on a toasted hoagie roll.

burgers.name: Cheddar Chicken Supreme
burgers.description: Our supreme chicken burger features a grilled chicken patty, topped with smoky cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, vine-ripened tomatoes, crunchy pickles, and a savory BBQ sauce on a toasted brioche bun.
